articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
AIRDROP ALERT 🚨
@geniexyz the NFT aggregator got acquired by @Uniswap
Users who used Genie more than once before April 15th or hold a Genie NFT will receive a $USDC airdrop.🪂
Uniswap Labs 🦄: 4/ One more thing…
To welcome the Genie community to the Uniswap universe, we’ll be airdropping USDC later this summer to anyone who used Genie more than once before April 15 or holds a GENIE:GEM NFT 🧞‍♂️🦄

articles.description:
Arbitrum Odyssey starting in 1 hour! 🔵

Our gut tells us the Bonus NFT could be used as multiplier during the $ARBI airdrop 👀

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re Token confirmed but not an airdrop at first.
IDO for $USDC on the 24th of June at 3PM UTC on Zigzag itself.
Community will be able to vote on airdrop criteria after.
ZigZag Exchange: The anticipation is finally over..
Introducing: ZigZag's token!
This thread will go into detail about:
- Our community-driven airdrop procedure
- Launching our token as fairly as possible and the formation of ZigZag's DAO
- Round 1 of our public sale: the first IDO on @zksync!

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Re They call the game Immortal because it's Chess with some twists.
Players can select to play with up to 4 NFT pieces that have special quests.
E.g "Queen must capture at least 3 pieces" earns you extra points (in future tokens) if you do manage to capture 3 pieces..
